summary: Add explicit type and None item validation to format_list() to prevent silent failures and unclear crashes

changes.description: Added isinstance() check for todos parameter and validation for None items in list
Added 5 regression tests for None input handling

acceptance_criteria_met: format_list(None) raises TypeError instead of returning 'No todos yet.'
format_list([None]) raises clear ValueError about None items
All existing formatter tests still pass
risks: Breaking change: code that previously called format_list(None) will now raise TypeError instead of returning 'No todos yet.'
Minimal performance impact: additional type check and None item validation on each format_list call
